original_text: Then Joseph woke up from his sleep. He did what God's angel had said to him. He married Mary and he took her to his home.
korean_text: 요셉이 잠에서 깨어 일어나 주의 사자의 분부대로 행하여 그의 아내를 데려왔으나

sentences.original_text: Then Joseph woke up from his sleep
He did what God's angel had said to him
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 하나님의 천사가 자기에게 말한 것을 행했습니다

sentences.original_text: and he took her to his home
